attributes.action: allow Horticulture and Agricultural (Rural science) to be entered back onto the curriculum as a science or as a vocational subject.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As someone who has personally just sat the final Rural Science exam in a rural area that has been awarded the "Rural Dimension" award and is being entered for a green flag award, I propose that rural science be put back onto the curriculem as a vocational subject as farming/gardening is a vocation. As we all use the land and eat freely,we should have the chance to learn about livestock for were our food comes from and the diverse vegetation in our country that we see everyday.
